uvi.description:
drm/amd/display: Fix potential memory leak in DMUB hw_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.12 by commit aa000f828e60ac15d6340f606ec4a673966f5b0b. For more details please see the references link.
